entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near 8.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 except 90 gusting to 110 over exposed coastal sections early this evening. Wind becoming southeast 30 gusting to 50 early this evening. Temperature steady near 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 7. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of showers in the morning. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except 70 gusting to 90 over exposed coastal sections early in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 in the morning then southeast 20 early in the afternoon. Temperature steady near 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
